name: Derek Eager
content: Derek Eager Derek Eager B.Sc. (Regina); M.Sc., Ph.D. (Toronto) Department of Computer Science University of Saskatchewan Room 281.2 Thorvaldson Building 110 Science Place Saskatoon, SK S7N 5C9 Canada (306) 966-4899 (office) (306) 966-4884 (fax) eager at cs dot usask dot ca Research Interests Design and performance evaluation of Internet applications. Current work is focused on systems for content delivery, such as of video. Professional Activities Professional activities have included active participation in SIGMETRICS, the ACM Special Interest Group on performance evaluation, including a term as SIGMETRICS Chair (2001-2003), service as program chair for the SIGMETRICS 1987 conference, and as a general co-chair for SIGMETRICS 2005. Current program committee memberships include ACM SIGMETRICS 2026. Teaching Term 2 2025/26 CMPT 215 CMPT 434 Publications Some interesting links ...
